transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Sushant ji baat kar rahe hai sir?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Sir, mai Priyanka baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, kaise hai aap?
Customer: Ji, bataiye.
Executive: Sir, aapka na ek feedback abhi receive hua tha sir, aap please batayenge kya problem aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Wo to problem aa raha tha ki ye jo seller buyer jo mil rahe hai wo wrong number bol rahe hai call karne ke baad.
Executive: Wrong number bol rahe hai?
Customer: Ha, jyadatar to wrong number bol rahe hai aur jo mil raha hai wo jaise rate bol rahe hai us rate pe dena possible hi nahi hai, market me wo rate hai hi nahi.
Executive: Accha, sir, aisa kaise ho sakta hai, sare number to aisa nahi ho sakte.
Customer: Nahi, sare number ki baat nahi bol raha hu, majority to wo wrong number bol rahe hai. Matlab wo kya, samajh nahi aa raha.
Executive: Hmm, might be ho sakta hai sir, kuch galat number ho, thik hai, might be ye ho sakta hai misplace ho gaya ho ek do number aur aap ye bata rahe ho ki pricing me bahut jyada problem aa raha hai, might pricing me negotiation karna pad raha hai. Pricing jo hai market me buyer ye kya hai, kaise hai?
Customer: Ha, bahut, bahut kam mang rahe hai, matlab market rate jo hai nahi usse bhi kam mang rahe hai, matlab hamara jisme hota hai na usse bhi kam mang rahe hai.
Executive: Okay, to sir, maine pura research kar liya ye to dena possible nahi hai, India me kahapar bhi nahi milta.
Customer: Kahi bhi nahi milega.
Executive: Yaha bhi aa raha hai na sir, ki aapne apne product me price bhi nahi add kare hue hai, isliye wo negotiation ki vajah aapke itna kam price aapse mang rahe hai, aap price add rakhenge to wahi buyer aapko thoda kareeb karenge jo jo price aapne dala hua hai.
Customer: Buyer to connect, buyer ko hum connect kar rahe hai, abhi tak to ye catalog nahi banaya hai thik se, to mai bana deta hu. Lekin jo jinka requirement hai unhone dala hai, unko call kar rahe hai to wo wrong number bol rahe hai, ye ek main problem hai.
Executive: Okay, mai ek baar aise check kara leti hu sir, might be ho sakta hai ki ek do numbero me aisa issue ho gaya ho.
Customer: Nahi, ek do number nahi, saat aath, saat aath number, saat aath ke number wrong number bata rahe hai.
Executive: Aap ek baar number mujhe share kijiye, mai check karti hu. Baki sir, mujhe ek aur cheez bataiye aap, aapne apne products me price nahi add karke rakhe hai.
Customer: Ha, nahi wo, wo nahi nahi karni hai, wo aaj tak ho jayega. Aaj mai add kar lunga.
Executive: Sir, aap mujhe agar aap possible hai to aap mujhe bata do mai add kar deti hu, isme koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Ha, nahi nahi mai kar lunga.
Executive: Nahi, aapko nahi ki aap aap khud add karenge to aap khud add kar sakte hai, thik hai? Aur baki sir aapke jo hamare products me na sir aapne category vagera nahi add ki hui hai humne, thik hai? Aur groups bhi add nahi hai aapke kuch products ki to wo bhi sari cheeze humko sir add karani padengi. Ki aapke na catalog me bahut sara kaam pending hai, thik hai? Aur ek aur problem aa raha hai sir, aapne yaha pe na alag alag category ke products add kiye hue hai, matlab aapne rice bhi add kiya hua hai, thik hai? Aapke construction services ka bhi.
Customer: Ha, nahi nahi construction ka hata denge, abhi construction ka to down chal raha hai, abhi wo hata denge pura.
Executive: Okay, to main kaam kya hai sir apna vaise?
Customer: Nahi, main to construction ka hi tha, lekin wo nahi chal raha hai to abhi thoda local me hi hum focus karenge. To ye chawal ka mera bhaiya ka hai to wo matlab wo sambhalta hai, to mai usme wo karne ka soch raha hu abhi.
Executive: To aap apne sare product jo hai wo ye rice me hi karna chah rahe ho?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Pan India me bhi dealing karti hai aapki ya fir aap locally dealing karte hai?
Customer: Nahi nahi, pan, pan India me.
Executive: Pan India me dealing karte hai, thik hai, aap kitna sir minimum order quantity chahiye hota hai aapko deal karne ke liye?
Customer: Minimum 30 ton.
Executive: Kitna, 5 ton?
Customer: Nahi, 30.
Executive: 30 ton minimum chahiye deal karne ke liye?
Customer: Ji, 30.
Executive: Thik hai, matlab 10 ton ke upar bhi hoga to karte hai.
Customer: 10 ton ke, aur pan India me sir, might be agar aisa ho sakta hai ki agar for example aap udhar taraf belong karte hai, thik hai, agar nearby aapko koi order aata hai 1000, 2000 ka ya fir 2 ton, 3 ton aisa.
Executive: Ha, wo to hum local me karte hi hai, wo to, nahi nahi wo to hum local me karte hai, nahi IndiaMART ke through bhi milega to wo bhi achcha hai.
Executive: Okay, okay, baki na sir aapke pass aapke account manager ka number hai Tauheed ka?
Customer: Kal aapki baat hui thi, kal aapki baat hui thi Tauheed se sir. Kal ke din me hi aapki baat hui hai, actually kya hai na sir aapke catalog me bahut sara kaam pending hai sir, wo sari cheeze na hum ek baar aapko karana padega.
Customer: Nahi nahi, mera to catalog ka, catalog ka Riddhi madam hai na wo sambhalte hai.
Executive: Thik hai, photos bhi add nahi hai sir, price bhi add nahi hai, hai na? Aur category bhi add nahi hai sir, to ye sari cheeze humko ek baar update karana padega. To aap ek time de do jis time pe aap video meet pe connect kar sakte hai so that hum aapko connect kar lenge sara pending work aapka complete kara denge catalog me.
Customer: Ha, aaj to mai nahi available nahi ho paunga, kal hi ho paunga. Mai hoga to mai add kar dunga, ha.
Executive: Accha, thik hai. To mai contact karta hu, mai free hoke aapko contact kar lunga.
Executive: Koi problem nahi hai, mai ek baar kal connect kara dungi sir, thik hai na? Tab tak ke liye aapka jo concern hai mai yaha se close kar de rahi hu, baki aapke pass ek feedback aayega to please feedback share kijiye ga aur mai aapko na apna number share kar rahi hu WhatsApp pe, aapko koi bhi issue hota hai jab bhi aap free rehte ho na ek baar aap message dal dijiyega.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai to hum aapko ek baar connect kar lenge virtual meeting pe, thik hai?
Customer: Ji, thank you.
Executive: Thik hai, thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wrong numbers from buyleads after calling.

- Pricing issues; buyers asking for very low prices.

- Products lack prices, categories, and groups.

- Different category products added.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to check the wrong number issue.

- Executive offered to add prices to products.

- Executive offered a video meet to complete pending work.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will connect the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, wrong number, pricing, catalog, products
